items.name: W3Swap
items.des: W3Swap is a fully decentralized aggregation exchange, dedicated to creating a highly liquid aggregation trading ecosystem and providing more valuable liquidity services for global users.

items.name: W3 Bridge
items.des: W3 Bridge is a universal cross-chain bridge dedicated to breaking the island effect

items.name: W3BANK
items.des: W3K is the native governance token of the decentralized lending market W3Bank. W3Bank is a platform focused on building a secure lending market and is a core component to stimulate the secondary growth of liquidity in the PEGO ecosystem.
